div.div: at New Wilmington, Pa. | Harold Burry Stadium

tr.td: Saint Vincent wins the coin toss, receives; WC defends north goal.
Justin Dahl kickoff 52 yards to the SVC13, Jhanard Dorsett return 5 yards to the SVC18 (Bill Madeja).
Shavonta Craft rush for 2 yards to the SVC20 (David Jamieson).
Damon Black rush for loss of 6 yards to the SVC14 (Todd Jeter).
Shavonta Craft rush for 2 yards to the SVC16 (Mac Quinn).
Christn Witchey punt 38 yards to the WES46, B. Paulinellie return 3 yards to the WES49 (Ben Davis).
Paul Columbo pass complete to J. Bentley for 51 yards to the SVC00, TOUCHDOWN, clock 13:18.
